messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

http://codereview.appspot.com/5641057/diff/3001/doc/go_spec.html File doc/go_spec.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5641057/diff/3001/doc/go_spec.html#newcode1145 doc/go_spec.html:1145: or any interface type that embeds T. An interface type T may not embed itself or any interface type that embeds T, recursively.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=98ef759f8fe9 ***

spec: address CL 5647054 comments

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5641057

subject: code review 5641057: spec: address CL 5647054 comments
